title: HMW and ideation -
sub_title: Workshop research to turn the user's pains into approachable and reachable goals.
method: Using the pain points found during the interview held with the target audience. We come up with HMW-questions tackling said pain points. Then we use an ideation session to come up with realistic and achievable solutions.
research: Research question 2: Are there new or existing techniques that we can apply in PARS to improve the experience?
findings: My personal contribution to this document are all the HMW-questions for the adminstrative target audience, including the ideation session below it. For the whole document please use the link below:
conclusion: By using the pain points provided by the target audience we were able to generate ideas on how to actually solve them, slowly narrowing down the focuss of the end product.
